title: Fix multi-roll UI bug - only first roll shows popup
description: When DM requests multiple dice rolls (e.g., stealth+attack+damage), only the first roll shows a popup. After completing the first roll, the remaining rolls never appear because MessageListContainer doesn't re-render when GameContext updates currentRollId. Fix: Subscribe to state.diceRollQueue in MessageListContainer to trigger re-renders when queue changes.
